nodes.text: Star Wars: The Complete Vehicle Cross-Sections and Blueprints

Star Wars: The Complete Vehicle Cross-Sections and Blueprints is a Star Wars Legends boxed set that collects three Star Wars reference texts: Star Wars: Complete Cross-Sections (2007), Star Wars Blueprints: The Ultimate Collection (2008), and Star Wars Blueprints: Rebel Edition (2010). The set divides the aforementioned works into three original titles—Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections: The Prequel Trilogy, Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections: The Classic Trilogy, and Star Wars Blueprints: The Classic Trilogy—and further includes a QR code to exclusive content. It was published by DK Publishing in 2012.
STAR WARS TECHNOLOGY AS YOU'VE NEVER SEEN IT BEFORE!

This definitive reference work reveals more than 50 essential spacecraft, vehicles, droids, and weapons from all six Star Wars movies. The amazing collection unites incredibly detailed cross-section artworks from the Star Wars Complete Cross-Sections book with one-of-a-kind blueprints from Star Wars Blueprints: The Ultimate Collection and Star Wars Blueprints: The Rebel Edition.
